name: CastleMouse Free
description:
Can you scare the mouse into the hole? Set up a chain reaction and get that mouse out of the castle! The rules are simple but it gets challenging fast.

Cycle of scare:
The mouse is scared by the cat, which is scared by the dog, which is scared by the warthog, which is scared by the lion, which is scared by the elephant, which is scared by the mouse!
